text: Cities and Years () is a 1930 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov.Непрокатное кино. Афиша 1-7 ноябряБиблиотека киноискусства приглашает на показы The movie is based on the eponymous novel by Konstantin Fedin. It stars Bernhard Goetzke, Ivan Chuvelyov, and Gennadiy Michurin. == Actors == * Bernhard Goetzke as Col. von Schonau * Ivan Chuvelyov as Andrei Startsov * Gennadiy Michurin as Kurt Van * Sofiya Magarill as Marie Uhrbach * Andrei Kostrichkin as Albert Birman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1930 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov
title: Cities and Years
